column1: A family man living a happy life in The Netherlands with my wife and 2 daughters!
A seasoned solution architect leader with 18 years of experience in complex and large scale IT solution design, development and transformation.

column2: Technical leadership for large scale digital/cloud transformation.
Bridging between business and technology development with creation and execution of strategy, proposition and value creation roadmap.
Creating and maintaining architecture strategy and architecture / systems roadmap.
Managing architecture runway to guide the transformation both at portfolio level and product level.

Leading organizational cloud adoption strategy, balancing architecture among cloud native, hybrid cloud and private cloud scenarios, balancing cloud strategy for migration, transformation, buy-in and new development.
Creating and maintaining cloud adoption KPI’s where TCO, RoI, organization’s short-term and long-term objectives are few of the key factors.
Balancing current state of architecture and target with feasible transition plan and continuous improvement.
Continuously evaluating new cutting-edge concepts and technologies to maintain organization’s competitive advantage.
Stakeholder management at every level of the organization and working as a bridge between business and technical team.
Leading multi-regional and diversified technical team of architects, engineers, and developers.
Leading cloud CoE’s, competence and practice development initiatives across the organizations.
Creating solution architecture of complex distributed systems.
Microservices, serverless, event driven architecture, API first, DDD, Multi-tenant/ SAAS.
Design for observability, auditing, monitoring and testability.
Design with shift left security approach.
Technical leadership in single and multi-teams product development.
Agile expert in small and scaled agile settings.

I received ""The Best Employee of The Year"" combined all branches and departments of CIMSOLUTIONS for my outstanding contribution to the company.', 'issuer': 'CIMSOLUTIONS', 'date': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}]","[{'name': 'SAFe 5 Program Consultant (SPC)', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'authority': 'Scaled Agile, Inc.', 'url': 'https://www.youracclaim.com/go/33qywzSjW1sIMQg6LQ2HRA', 'license_number': None, 'display_source': 'youracclaim.com', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Scaled Agile, Inc.', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQFti5SCrDfBWA/company-logo_400_400/0/1668017354645?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=KGAKulUhd4KRj0fc1jhvJFUDQ4jo1plycE-UZ4qm7cA', 'url': None}}, {'name': 'Togaf 9 Certification', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'authority': 'The Open Group', 'url': None, 'license_number': None, 'display_source': None, 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'The Open Group', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQHXlbV-DD9Z5Q/company-logo_400_400/0/1595234242756?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=6cNaLKFWl03OWjXqITJj4rOH6BTSF19_9biop-Kqpgk', 'url': None}}]",[],[],[],[],[],"[{'company': {'id': 1090, 'name': 'Philips', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQG4O5wCG6zf2Q/company-logo_400_400/0/1519855869410?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=nckPFFIatOW5k72Vbjusy3ph4jMtjVRp2GpRIrfF8Es', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/philips/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Eindhoven, North Brabant, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Philips', 'description': ""Philips is in a journey of improving 2.5 billions of life per year by 2030. Cloud has been one of the biggest enablers to achieve this ambitious goal. I have been trying to add my tiny contribution to this big journey to make people's life a little better everyday. 

A summary of my responsibilties include:

1.	Helping Philips businesses in their cloud transformation initiatives.

     --  Creating architecture strategy to move towards cloud first approach while complex scenarios like 
         on premise, hybrid cloud, private cloud, edge computing etc. integrated with-in the strategy.

     --  Creating architecture transition plan from current baseline towards the target while ensuring 
         regular review of the target architecture to enable it for continuous improvement and agile way of 
         implementation. 

      --  Enablement of data as an asset to make data free from silos, to make data available across the 
         organization to generate intelligent insights by applying AI and ML. 

2. Collaborating architects across the organization and experts from cloud vendors to crate reference 
    architectures for different use cases. Example: Cloud Connectivity, Data Ingestion and Conversion 
    pipeline, Observability and monitoring, Digital Twin, Data simulation etc.

3. Owning and managing cloud landing zones for respective department to make sure every users and 
    applications comply with organizational guardrails and security policies. 

4. Leading a team of cloud architects to guide them creating architectures for different propositions, 
    PoC’s and MVP implementations. 

5. Creating roadmap, action plan and oversee execution of cloud competence development.

6. Being an SPC (SAFe Certified Program Consultant), promoting the agile culture in every activity I have 
    been involved with."", 'title': 'Principal Cloud Solutions Architect', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 11879, 'name': 'CIMSOLUTIONS', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQHEjxTTo3p3nA/company-logo_400_400/0/1664524335706?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=9p0j_RrDx6-S9CYtaqImr-eKkOF-LIhk0fje1sZhFeY', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/cimsolutions/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'CIMSOLUTIONS', 'description': 'CIMSOLUTIONS is a multiple times award winner top ICT consultancy company in Netherlands working for automation of services, industries and business.

Roles and Responsibilities:
As a technical leader in CIMSOLUTIONS, my core responsibility is to work with its clients to help them in solution architecture, systems and solutions design, data strategy, IT security, cloud transformation, agile transformation  and technology capability enhancement.

Besides, working with the clients, I also contribute to CIMSOLUTIONS in its pre-sales activities, corporate systems architecture, knowledge management, training programs, seminar, workshops and social event organization.

Competence Centers:

Be a member of leadership team of multiple CIMSOLUTIONS Competence Centers to lead innovation across 4 domains:
	Cloud
	Architecture
	DevOps
	SAFe and Agile

Trainer:

	Leading SAFe (SAFe 5.1)
	SAFe for Architects (SAFe 5.1)
	Eligible to train 10 other SAFe courses.

Speaking Engagement:

	Continuous Everything
	Digital Transformation
	Evolution of Architecture and DevOps for future
	Continuous Everything
	Enterprize Architecture - Understanding the current state is a prerequisite. 
	Cloud transformation is a journey not a buy in.
	Outlook of architects of the future.
	Creating an agile organization - challenges and mitigation.
	Stakeholder engagement and architecture governance - challenges and mitigation.
	Implementing DevOps in large organizations.
	Microservices facilitates iterative digital transformation for complex organizations.

Knowledge Management:

	Arranging and sourcing seminars, workshops and training activities.', 'title': 'Senior Systems Architect, Project Manager & Consultant', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'CIMSOLUTIONS', 'description': None, 'title': 'Senior Systems Designer & Senior Technical Project leader', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'CIMSOLUTIONS', 'description': None, 'title': 'System Designer & Technical Project Leader', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 4592, 'name': 'SKF Netherlands', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQEVVIqKW9y_gg/company-logo_400_400/0/1623329470969?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=ZAy65VvcQbWeUCpG9Wgd2_3GkVt1w6_Uk3Nx_2H-UmE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/skf/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'SKF Group', 'description': 'SKF has taken an ambitious digital transformation initiative with a philosophy of changing its core business model from selling bearings towards selling rotation! Under this initiative SKF is developing number of sensors, powered by IOT based cloud platform and AI based machine health analysis!

I have been technically leading this initiative since 2016!

- Creating architecture strategy and roadmap for SKF Connectivity Cloud Platform.
- Creating cloud based solution architecture.
- Cost benefit analysis of different cloud services and optimize / adjust usage of them.
- Design the system for security, CI/CD, testing, monitoring and observability.
- System requirement analysis and aligning business requirements to technical development roadmap.
- Engage with stakeholders to align business, customer and technology.
- Facilitate and support in features prioritization using WSJF approach.
- Designing and documenting sensor firmware upgrade protocol, sensor data propagation protocol, API maintenance protocol.
- Creating and maintaining infrastructure as code. 
- Participate in hands on development to create frameworks and building blocks for making the architecture easily consumable and maintainable. 
- System requirement analysis and aligning business requirements to technical development roadmap.
- Technical ownership for both business requirements and NFR’s.


Tools and Concepts

- Cloud Platform: AWS
- Architecture Approach: Event Driven, Microservices, Serverless, API first.
- Cloud Services: IOT,  Lambda, S3, Step Function, EC2, Api Gateway, Redshift, DynamoDB, RDS, Cognito, Okta, Kinesis, SQS, SNS, Route53, Cloudfront, Cloudwatch, Cloudformation, CDK, SSM, Secret Manager, PowerBI etc.
- Architecture Tools: VISIO, Archimate
- Programming: C#, Powershell, Cloudformation, Angular, Javascript, Nodejs, Json, Json Schema etc.
- DevOps: Azure DevOps, Jenkins  
- Communication: Microsoft Teams, Slack, Miro 
- Repository: Azure Devops, Office 365, Sharepoint.', 'title': 'Cloud Architect', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1814, 'name': 'Europol', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHUDJ07xXKYwA/company-logo_400_400/0/1576249322301?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=q9feHOUk9ANrLaHX0AAkuGVsWyjzcQ7APk7XMvaLWi0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/europol/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'Europol', 'description': ""Europol is the European Union’s law enforcement agency whose main goal is to help achieve a safer Europe. Europol has a state of the art IT platform that contains a number of large scale software systems and services to support the member state's operations towards a safe and secured Europe.

I worked in Europol as a senior specialist of system design and development in its secured message exchange platform during 2014 and 2016. Secured message exchange platform of Europol was its flagship IT platform that facilitates exchange of confidential information across member states security agencies and security agencies of different other states.

Roles and Responsibilities:
------------------------------
-	To evaluate existing application integration architecture and re-shaping it for facing the growing challenge of handling more users and traffics to different systems where cross system information flow is crucial.
-	To design microservice based application architecture of Europol’s secured message exchange platform and making the road map of step by step implementation plan.
-	To make the cultural change from a monolithic system development process towards an agile DevOps based organization.
-	To work with the security architect to define the security implementation strategy of the platform.
-	To design, develop and test different modules of larger platform.

Tools
-------
TOGAF 9.1, Visio, .Ne, MVC, SqlServer, C#, AngularJS, TypeScript, NHibernate, VmWare, Powershell, Confluence, Biztalk, ActiveMQ, XML/XSLT, JSON/JSON Schema, Team Foundation Server, Teamcity etc."", 'title': 'Senior Specialist', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 39399, 'name': 'Pantheon - Offshore Development Center at Dhaka (Jaxara)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQFmTFS0vlY99g/company-logo_400_400/0/1582743798239?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=W11VehQiXipKIhqsJVKJF5vRcEcogjW_9UKvigeqSuE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/-pantheon-/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Dhaka, Bangladesh', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'Pantheon', 'description': 'Pantheon is a customized software solution provider in USA. It is specialized in developing customized software systems mainly for health care sector and non-profits. 
It has an offshore design and development center at Dhaka, Bangladesh.

Roles and Responsibilities:
----------------------------

- Implement agile way of working across the organization.
- Introduce and lead agile product management.
- Introduce and lead Scrum and Scrum of Scrum.
- Work as technical leader of a multinational software development team (40+ FTE)
- Take part in the recruitment process to ensure top talents are realized in the team.
- Analyze system requirements and come up with technical solutions.
- Analyze systems performance and scalability issues to reach optimum solutions.
- Design, develop and maintain Pantheon business rule engine.
- Work as a coach and mentor for the team.
- Work to design and develop different APIs and frameworks for Pantheon.
- Work as a lead application architect in diverse software systems of Pantheon.
- Empower team members by ensuring a casual and innovation focused work environment.

Tools:
-------------
